name: Martins Lawrence
description: Hi, firstly thanks for having a further look at me, I’m way out of my depth in this sort of thing, it’s all totally new for me. I joined the dating site because I still believe in true love, in romance and the “happily ever after.” but dating from the Internet has been interpreted in so many things that almost can not find the good that comes our way, but with hope and trust we will find what we are all looking for. I’m so tired of my loneliness as I have the love and care soo much in my heart to give my partner if I find her here. I have no rush or hurry to meet my right woman eventually Gods time is the best .. if you wanna get to know me,better ,lets talk more I will stop right here and thanks for the time you had on my profile Enjoy your day 🙂
